hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Abu Huraira that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:If it were not hard upon my Umma (to follow my example), I would not lag behind any expedition-as in the traditions gone before

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الْجِهَادِ وَالْخُرُوجِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of Jihad and going out (to fight) in the cause of Allah
